2009 In Review
2009 was a very busy year for us. We attended several trade shows, hosted numerous webinars and continued to grow our company. Here are some of our achievements from the past year:
-Our legal customer base grew by nearly 20% in 2009
-We held 15 webinars this past year and had over 1100 registrants
-We met with over 500 of you at various Risk Roundtables, Finance Forums, User Group Meetings, conferences and trade shows
Dan Tacone Joins IntApp
We're pleased to announce that Dan Tacone has joined IntApp as President, reporting to CEO, John Hall. Dan has been charged with overseeing IntApp's continued growth, both in terms of clients served and value delivered.
Prior to joining IntApp, Dan served several executive roles at Thomson, including Senior Vice President and General Manager of its Elite business unit. At Thomson, Dan developed, positioned and introduced the Elite brand into international markets, achieving significant revenue growth.
Dan can be reached at: Dan.Tacone@intapp.com.
Activity Tracker 2.0
We're pleased to announce the availability of Activity Tracker 2.0. (Formerly known as ADAM.)
Activity Tracker watches for unusual activity and gives management an early warning so they can investigate and address any concerns before they become serious crises.
With the help of Activity Tracker, several IntApp clients have:
-Successfully prevented lateral defections
-Blocked inappropriate treatment or leakage of firm and client information
-Improved internal utilization of firm applications and user productivity
You can learn more about Activity Tracker by accessing our client self-service resource center at http://www.intapp.com/products/atclientconfirm.html. It's a convenient way to watch a recorded demonstration, hear several client testimonials, and get an overview of the business drivers and benefits of the product. (There's also a downloadable PDF that summarizes the product's business benefits, which you might want to circulate internally as well.)
2010 Risk Survey
Last year we sponsored a risk management survey and received an excellent response. Participants included a variety of risk stakeholders including general counsel, loss prevention, risk management and conflicts personnel from over 100 firms.
The 2010 risk management survey is now underway. This year we are conducting a UK risk management survey as well. All participants will receive a copy of the published report. If you have not received an email invitation and would like to take part in the survey, please send an email to Lea.Simon@intapp.com.
IntApp Customer Community and Resource Center Updates
We are pleased to announce that the Customer Community has been updated! The community now has a technical forum as well as a general discussion forum for each of our three product lines. Visit the Customer Community at https://www.intapp.com/community/index.php.
The IntApp Resource Center has also been updated with new Rule Templates for generating billing reports and interacting with Blackberry Enterprise Servers. The Rule Library contains hundreds of integration templates for working with common legal systems. Visit the Resource Center at https://www.intapp.com/resourceCenter/index.php.
The Customer Community and Resource Center are valuable resources for our clients who want to connect with other IntApp users or get access to documentation and integration templates. If you do not have an account on the Customer Community or Resource Center but you would like one, please contact support@intapp.com.
IntApp on Twitter (corporate and risk accounts)
You can now follow the latest IntApp updates on twitter. We have also created a Risk Roundtable twitter account for law firm risk-related news. To follow us, visit twitter.com/intapp and twitter.com/riskroundtable.
Law Firm Risk Blog
For more detailed news updates on law firm risk management, you can read the new law firm risk management blog at: http://lawfirmrisk.blogspot.com/, a resource for risk professionals. Stay up to date on latest industry developments and news and sign up for email updates.
IntApp at Upcoming Events
IntApp will be at many conferences and tradeshows this winter. We always look forward to connecting with existing and potential clients at these events. If a colleague of yours is attending, please encourage them to say hello. Upcoming events include:
LegalTech New York February 1-3
Legal Malpractice & Risk Management Conference, Chicago March 3-5
Centaur Strategic Risk Management Conference, London March 15
